script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: What the hell is happening down here!?

script.speaker: PennyDialogue
script.name: Penny Sexton
lines: Hang on! Sensors are going crazy.
Fuck! Villain Corp. are firing on the base, and the pumps are offline.
You need to get out of there before the entire facility floods!

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: Hang on, I'm going back for Horizon!

script.speaker: PennyDialogue
script.name: Penny Sexton
lines: There's no time!

script.speaker: Dialogue
lines: Hero Corp. approaching. Orders are to not let them reach the engine.

script.speaker: HorizonBadDialogue
script.name: Horizon
lines: Affirmative.

script.speaker: PennyDialogue
script.name: Penny Sexton
lines: Ho-Horizon!?

script.speaker: HorizonBadDialogue
script.name: Horizon
lines: Contact with enemy agents is prohibited.

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: What's wrong with her?

script.speaker: PennyDialogue
script.name: Penny Sexton
lines: Those bastards must have used the reconstruction engine on her!

script.speaker: KittyDialogue
script.name: Kitty Sexton
lines: Come off your high horse, sis. Your side's been doing it for years.

script.speaker: HorizonBadDialogue
script.name: Horizon
lines: Enemy agent entering operational region.
Preparing to engage.

script.speaker: KittyDialogue
script.name: Kitty Sexton
lines: Reinforcements are a few minutes out. Maintain defensive position.
We CAN'T lose the reconstruction engine.

script.speaker: HorizonBadDialogue
script.name: Horizon
lines: Acknowledged.

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: Horizon! Snap out of it!

script.speaker: HorizonBadDialogue
script.name: Horizon
lines: Terminating enemy contacts.

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: Shit!

script.speaker: PennyDialogue
script.name: Penny Sexton
lines: Snap out of it, Horizon! You can fight this!

script.speaker: HorizonBadDialogue
script.name: Horizon
lines: Hnn... urk...
Nng... Engaging.

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: Horizon has been neutralized.

script.speaker: PennyDialogue
script.name: Penny Sexton
lines: Your top priority is to secure the reconstruction engine.
Orders are to extract it back to main HQ.

script.speaker: PennyDialogue
script.name: Penny Sexton
lines: Azure Burst? Can you hear me?
What's going on out there?

script.speaker: PennyDialogue
script.name: Penny Sexton
lines: The reconstruction engine just went offline. What the hell happened!?

script.speaker: AzureDialogue
script.name: Azure Burst
lines: The right thing.

script.speaker: PennyDialogue
script.name: Penny Sexton
lines: Goddammnit, Azure Burst! When are you going to learn to follow orders?
